name: Where's Tenma
description:
Happy Birthday to Tenma Sumeragi 2021!!!

Game Info:

  • Act Addict Actors (A3) fan-made game
  • HTML5
  • Made with Phaser 3
  • Assets are either drawn by me or submitted by the kind folks at Mankai Kisetsu

If you find any bugs or are experiencing any issues, please feel free to send me a DM on Twitter about it.

My Twitter is @no_xiruo
